value:
How happy it must make the people
of this land to celebrate the harvest
festival with Princess L'Arachel!

Oh, yes. We celebrate fall's bounty
with a festival in Rausten as well,
indeed we do!

All the little laddies and lassies are
beaming! Gwah ha ha! All children
deserve to carry beautiful memories.

If you don't mean to see how dogged
I can be, you'll hand over your candy
to me right now—or suffer a trick!

Rennac! Rennac! Where are you?
Did he run off again? Tsk, tsk...
What am I to do now?

I hie from $Nf's
noble castle, bearing autumn's
bounty! Gwah ha ha!

Gwah ha ha! See, Princess L'Arachel?
I'm in perfect form!

Seems I'm getting stronger,
and that's all I care about.
A terrible failure am I. Terrible.

The power's flowing through me!
I'll keep pace with you youngsters
for a good while yet!

Gwah ha ha! The name's Dozla, and
I'll make this a harvest festival to
remember—for Princess L'Arachel!

In all the long years I've served
Princess L'Arachel, I've attended
festivals across the lands...$k$pThis harvest festival is amongst the
best of the bunch, I say! Everyone's
in high spirits, dancing and smiling!$k$pOf course, Princess L'Arachel shines
the brightest of all. I've not seen her
so happy in quite an age!$k$pI've you to thank for that. It's your
doing that we've been able to enjoy
such a fine time.$k$pI'll repay you in kind—I swear it. I
know the princess feels the same!
We won't let you down. Gwah ha ha!
ほいっ
ふんぬ！
ぎゃっ…
Careless...!
Trick or treat!
To the harvest!
Gimme yer candy!
Now, just a trick!
My belly's...a-rumbling...
*halloween guffaw*
For Lady L'Arachel, I'll gather all the sweets I can get my hands on!
Hm? You're not trying to trick me, are you?
Lady L'Arachel helped me put this costume together. Looks great, right?
The more candy I collect, the more I'll have to give out to the little ones!
Putting in hard work all year is what earns us this bounty!
Everyone looks brilliant—but Lady L'Arachel shines brighter than them all.
Festivals are great! There's no better place for growing closer with friends.
Is there candy?
Hmm...
Rawr!
